description:
Reduce hands-on time .
Can realize the midway refill .
Drip by drip drainage, precise control .
Add the last drop of liquid discharge button
Compatible with glass or plastic serological pipettes (0.1 - 100mL).
3μm replaceable hydrophobic filter.
Fast suction, can absorb 25mL liquid in 4 secs.
Humanized functional design, 118g ultra-light texture .
Simple and sensitive liquid level regulation.
Five color designs: blue, green, red, yellow, North Carolina blue, easy to distinguish between different applications. MaxMed UAE is the leading supplier of Lab Essentials (Tubes, Pipettes, Glassware) in Dubai and across the United Arab Emirates. We provide professional Lab Essentials (Tubes, Pipettes, Glassware) with same-day quotes, fast delivery, installation support, and comprehensive after-sales service. Contact us at +971 55 460 2500 for expert consultation and competitive pricing.
